name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Matuto | Learn web3 in every new tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple chromium-based browser extension for learning web3 in every new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Matuto is a simple chromium-based browser extension that provides a glossary of terms and definitions related to web3, blockchain and cryptocurrencies when every time you open a new tab from your browser.

It's a Filipino word which means "to learn". Which is the goal of this project, to help people learn more about web3, blockchain and cryptocurrencies. ðŸ’œðŸ’™ðŸ“–
